id: The No Plan B Journey [NOTION TEMPLATE]: Pursue Your Plan A & Change Your Life In 6 Months
name: The No Plan B Journey [NOTION TEMPLATE]: Pursue Your Plan A & Change Your Life In 6 Months
description: The No Plan B Journey is a self-development journey where you will eliminate Plan B and pursue Plan A. The purpose of the journey is to change your life in 6 months. You will make the uncomfortable comfortable and do things that matter to you. For the next 6 months, you will overcome limiting thoughts, face your fears, and become the best version of you. What's included:Thought Dump SectionKnowledge Nook SectionLearning ListMonthly Progress JournalHabit TrackerAdditional Resources:Check out The
features: Thought Dump Section; Knowledge Nook Section; Learning List; Monthly Progress Journal; Habit Tracker
